text: "It Takes Two" is a 1966 song by Marvin Gaye and Kim Weston. It was taken from their duet album Take Two and went to number 16 in the United Kingdom and number 14 in the United States and Canada. ==Rod Stewart and Tina Turner version== In 1990 Rod Stewart and Tina Turner covered It Takes Two for the Pepsi television commercial. It went to number 5 in the United Kingdom and topped the single charts in Denmark. == References == Category:1966 songs Category:Soul songs Category:Marvin Gaye songs Category:Otis Redding songs Category:Rod Stewart songs Category:Tina Turner songs
title: It Takes Two (Marvin Gaye and Kim Weston song)
